WOO HOO Trevor, you rock. Thanks so much.

starsuncloud@... writes:

It's a quest chain, you can find it at _http://www.thottbothttp://wwhttp_

it leads to:_http://www.thottbothttp://www.t_

" Work like you don't need the money, love like you've never been hurt, and
dance like you do when nobody's watching."

nothing."

" Knowledge is power but how you use that power defines wether you are good
or evil."

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Re: OT: WOW help
messages.msgSnippet: LOL WOW is game for the  computer.  I am a gnome warlock (my character) and i can obtain a spell at  the level that i am at, that will transform me into a bear
messages.messageBody:
LOL WOW is game for the computer. I am a gnome warlock (my character) and i
can obtain a spell at the level that i am at, that will transform me into a
bear which gives me a better advantage over enemies. I cant find the quest
giver and a lot of people and their kids on this list play WOW so i thought one
of them might be able to help me. Make sense?

In a message dated 1/10/2007 1:15:39 P.M. Central Standard Time,
kristenhendricks55@... writes:




Okay I know I am new here so forgive my cluelessness.Ok

but uhh..

You want to turn yourself into a bear? I'm so confused..







~Alyssa in IL
_http://squishymommy.blogspot.com_ (http://squishymommy.blogspot.com/)


" Work like you don't need the money, love like you've never been hurt, and
dance like you do when nobody's watching."

"All that is necessary for the triumph of evil is that good people do
nothing."

" Knowledge is power but how you use that power defines wether you are good
or evil."

messages.subject: OT: WOW help
messages.msgSnippet: I am hoping that we might have someone on here who can help me( or  someone s kid).  I am working on my Gnome Warlock and want to get the spell  that turns me
messages.messageBody:
I am hoping that we might have someone on here who can help me( or someone's
kid). I am working on my Gnome Warlock and want to get the spell that turns
me into bear form but i cant find it. I am hoping that someone has gone
this far with a Warlock and can help me find or lead me to the start of the
quest to get my bear form. Thanks in advance for anyone who can point me in the
right direction.

~Alyssa in IL
_http://squishymommy.blogspot.com_ (http://squishymommy.blogspot.com/)


" Work like you don't need the money, love like you've never been hurt, and
dance like you do when nobody's watching."

"All that is necessary for the triumph of evil is that good people do
nothing."

" Knowledge is power but how you use that power defines wether you are good
or evil."






[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
